movies.title: Fasten Your Seatbelts
movies.plot: Elena (Kasia Smutniak) and Antonio (Francesco Arca) seem not to be made for each other. They are too different in terms of character, life choices, worldview, and the way they relate to others. They are total opposites. However, they are overwhelmed by a mutual attraction they're trying hard to avoid; but to which they succumb to. This dramedy on relationships also gets a very credible performance from Paola Miraccione, who plays the tragic, albeit funny, character Egle.
movies.simplePlot: Elena (Kasia Smutniak) and Antonio (Francesco Arca) seem not to be made for each other. They are too different in terms of character, life choices, worldview, and the way they relate to ...

biography.bio: Kasia Smutniak was born on August 13, 1979 in Pila, Wielkopolskie, Poland as Katarzyna Anna Smutniak. She is an actress, known for From Paris with Love (2010), Fasten Your Seatbelts (2014) and Perfect Strangers (2016).
biography.name: Kasia Smutniak

biography.bio: Francesco Arca was born on November 19, 1979 in Siena, Tuscany, Italy. He is an actor, known for Spectre (2015), Fasten Your Seatbelts (2014) and Married to a Cop (2007).
biography.name: Francesco Arca

biography.bio: Filippo Scicchitano is an actor, known for Fasten Your Seatbelts (2014), Une journée à Rome (2012) and Bianca come il latte, rossa come il sangue (2013).
biography.name: Filippo Scicchitano

biography.bio: Blonde beauty Carolina Crescentini was born in Rome on April 18, 1980; daughter of two commerce graduates, she grew up in the Roman quarter of Monteverde. She originally wanted to be a film critic but at 19 her interest in acting increased and she decided to attend several acting schools, including the "Teatro Azione" and the prestigious "Centro Sperimentale di Cinematografia". She appeared in a TV commercial (directed by Gabriele Muccino), several music videos and short films, but her breakthrough came in 2007, when she was chosen by director Fausto Brizzi for the teen comedy and box office hit La nuit avant les exams 2 (2007), opposite Nicolas Vaporidis. The film was so successful that Vaporidis and Crescentini teamed up again six months later to shoot the thriller Béton armé (2007), in which for the first time, starring as a rape victim, she showed her dramatic talent; she received a Best Actress nomination at the Silver Ribbon Awards for this film. The following year she starred as Benedetta in Tell Me About Love (2008), in which she was directed by Gabriele Muccino's brother Silvio. Her excellent performance as a fragile and self destructive girl in the film brought her her first nomination at the David di Donatello Awards (the Italian Oscars). Always giving interesting performances (even in small roles, such as Anna in The Demons of St. Petersburg (2008)), Carolina Crescentini is undoubtedly one of the most talented young actresses that Italy has to offer at the moment.
biography.name: Carolina Crescentini

biography.bio: Francesco Scianna was born on March 25, 1982 in Palermo, Sicily, Italy. He is an actor, known for Baarìa (2009), Fasten Your Seatbelts (2014) and Angel of Evil (2010).
biography.name: Francesco Scianna

biography.bio: Carla Signoris was born on October 10, 1960 in Genoa, Liguria, Italy. She is an actress, known for Days and Clouds (2007), Fasten Your Seatbelts (2014) and No Spring Chicken (1996). She has been married to Maurizio Crozza since 1992. They have two children.
biography.name: Carla Signoris

biography.bio: Elena Sofia Ricci was born on March 29, 1962 in Florence, Tuscany, Italy as Elena Sofia Barucchieri. She is an actress, known for I Cesaroni (2006), Caravaggio (2007) and Io e mia sorella (1987). She has been married to Stefano Mainetti since October 2003. They have one child. She was previously married to Luca Damiani.
biography.name: Elena Sofia Ricci

biography.bio: Paola Minaccioni was born on September 25, 1971 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. She is an actress, known for A Magnificent Haunting (2012), Le premier qui l'a dit (2010) and Fasten Your Seatbelts (2014).
biography.name: Paola Minaccioni

biography.bio: Giulia Michelini was born on June 2, 1985 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. She is an actress, known for La fille du lac (2007), Cado dalle nubi (2009) and Remember Me, My Love (2003).
biography.name: Giulia Michelini

biography.bio: Luisa Ranieri was born on December 16, 1973 in Naples, Campania, Italy. She is an actress, known for Letters to Juliet (2010), The Immature (2011) and Fasten Your Seatbelts (2014). She has been married to Luca Zingaretti since May 23, 2012. They have two children.
biography.name: Luisa Ranieri

biography.bio: Maria Sole Piccinni is an actress, known for Fasten Your Seatbelts (2014).
biography.name: Maria Sole Piccinni

biography.bio: Francesca Romana Verzaro is an actress, known for Fasten Your Seatbelts (2014), Unico Grande Amore (2015) and MultipleX (2013).
biography.name: Francesca Romana Verzaro
